snippet.title: ESC Ape Trailer
snippet.description:
ESC Ape is an old school inspired first person shooter made in 7 days for 7DFPS 2014 (http://7dfps.com).

The game uses 32x32 pixel textures and the Commodore 64 color palette.
It features 2 awesome weapons, 3 awesome levels (which can be player in any order and 15 bananas (5 hidden in each level!)
It also has music (or something similar to that).

The game is totally free and can be downloaded for Windows, Mac and Linux at http://yanneyanen.itch.io/esc-ape

http://www.yanneyanen.com/
